name: NirLauncher Package List
summary: Learn about .NLP files and view a list of programs that open them.

content: For example, if you want to be able to launch a Windows utility called MyUtility.exe from within NirLauncher, you can store the utility in ~/​nirsoft/​MyFolder and then list MyFolder/​MyUtility.exe in nirsoft.nlp. Your utility will then appear and be available to launch from within NirLauncher. (You must also list additional details for your utility, following the formatting that nirsoft.nlp's other utilities use.)
The default version of nirsoft.nlp includes a list of over 200 Windows utilities. These are the default utilities included with NirLauncher.

NirLaucher's website includes additional NLP files, which can be used to automatically install additional utilities. For example, sysinternals5.nlp can be used to install the SysInternals Suite utility.

instructions: You can open and edit an NLP file in any text editor, such as Microsoft Notepad (Windows), Apple TextEdit (Mac), or GitHub Atom (cross-platform).
To use an NLP file to install additional NirLauncher utilities, follow the instructions found on NirLauncher's download page.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
